title: Is this the first fish caught by a drone?
text:
The Kansas farmer famous for viral videos made an amazing catch and caught it on video.
Derek Klingenberg, who was famous for serenading his cows with a trombone to the tune of "Royals" by Lorde has taken to the skies.
In his most recent video, "Farmer Derek" records his "first attempt" to catch a fish using a DJI model drone. The video shows the drone pulling the fish out of the water and Klingenberg flying his catch to shore.
(YouTube.com/ Farmer Derek Klingenberg ) "My first drone fish," Klingenberg announces in the video.
First drone fish! pic.twitter.com/dvGy4SERmQ
â€” Farmer Derek (@KlingenbergFarm) August 31, 2015 Klingenberg is also known for other viral videos including "What Does The Farmer Say?" which has over 6 million views.
